name: Spring Clamp
description: A spring clamp is a versatile woodworking tool that utilizes a spring mechanism to hold two or more objects together temporarily. It features two jaws that can be opened and closed with one hand, making it easy to apply pressure to workpieces without requiring additional tools. Ideal for holding wood, metal, or other materials, spring clamps are commonly used in woodworking projects for tasks such as gluing and assembly.
